mapper.select: select SAO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, CALL_CNT, REMARK, STS_CD, MAN_ID, WAR_ID, SYNC_DATE, PAYMENT_DATE, PUSH_DATE, TRACK_NO_DATE, FULFILLMENT_DATE, SETTLEMENT_DATE, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, FREIGHT_COST, HANDLING_FEE, CUSTOMER_REMARK, ORDER_NO, ORDER_STS, REFUND_STS, DELIVERY_STS, STO_ID, LAST_FREIGHT_COST, CANCLE_TIME, AUTO_PAY_STATUS, BUYER_CHECKOUT_MESSAGE, AUTO_PAY_TIME from bsp.sao where SAO_ID = #{saoId}
mapper.insert: insert into bsp.sao(CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, CALL_CNT, REMARK, STS_CD, MAN_ID, WAR_ID, SYNC_DATE, PAYMENT_DATE, PUSH_DATE, TRACK_NO_DATE, FULFILLMENT_DATE, SETTLEMENT_DATE, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, FREIGHT_COST, HANDLING_FEE, CUSTOMER_REMARK, ORDER_NO, ORDER_STS, REFUND_STS, DELIVERY_STS, STO_ID, LAST_FREIGHT_COST, CANCLE_TIME, AUTO_PAY_STATUS, BUYER_CHECKOUT_MESSAGE, AUTO_PAY_TIME) values (#{createdBy}, #{creationDate}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{callCnt}, #{remark}, #{stsCd}, #{manId}, #{warId}, #{syncDate}, #{paymentDate}, #{pushDate}, #{trackNoDate}, #{fulfillmentDate}, #{settlementDate}, #{productAmount}, #{freightCost}, #{handlingFee}, #{customerRemark}, #{orderNo}, #{orderSts}, #{refundSts}, #{deliverySts}, #{stoId}, #{lastFreightCost}, #{cancleTime}, #{autoPayStatus}, #{buyerCheckoutMessage}, #{autoPayTime})
mapper.update:
update bsp.sao
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate},
LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate},
CALL_CNT = #{callCnt},
REMARK = #{remark},
STS_CD = #{stsCd},
MAN_ID = #{manId},
WAR_ID = #{warId},
SYNC_DATE = #{syncDate},
PAYMENT_DATE = #{paymentDate},
PUSH_DATE = #{pushDate},
TRACK_NO_DATE = #{trackNoDate},
FULFILLMENT_DATE = #{fulfillmentDate},
SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate},
PRODUCT_AMOUNT = #{productAmount},
FREIGHT_COST = #{freightCost},
HANDLING_FEE = #{handlingFee},
CUSTOMER_REMARK = #{customerRemark},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo},
ORDER_STS = #{orderSts},
REFUND_STS = #{refundSts},
DELIVERY_STS = #{deliverySts},
STO_ID = #{stoId},
LAST_FREIGHT_COST = #{lastFreightCost},
CANCLE_TIME = #{cancleTime},
AUTO_PAY_STATUS = #{autoPayStatus},
BUYER_CHECKOUT_MESSAGE = #{buyerCheckoutMessage},
AUTO_PAY_TIME = #{autoPayTime},
where SAO_ID = #{saoId}
mapper.select: select sao.* from sys_user s join man m where s.man_buyer_id=m.man_id join sao where m.man_id=sao.man_id where s.user_id=#{userId}
